appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 14, 2026 10:00am-10:49am EST
appearances.snippet: i was glad to be joined by my fellow pennsylvania congressman rob bresnahan and daniel meuser. it was also proud to have russell redding, pennsylvania secretary of agriculture, and doctor troy ott, dean of penn state's college of agriculture science on the panel this year, we celebrated passage of my bill, the whole milk for healthy kids act, which will be soon signed into law and brings back the option of whole milk and 2% milk, including flavor, to our schools meal programs. dairy farmers from across the commonwealth championed the whole milk for healthy kids act, and i want to thank them for their support for this common sense bill. mr. speaker, the pennsylvania farm show has grown exponentially since it began over 100 years ago, a direct reflection of how our country's ag industry has grown. it was an honor to attend the farm show this year, and i thank all those who worked tirelessly to make this incredible event possible. thank you, mr. ser, and i yield back the balance of my. >> the gentleman yields. the chair now recognizes the gentleman from new york, mr.lat. >> thank
